overview: Explains why we as a species must recover the ability for natural birth and bring consciousness into the way we create a new generation. It features 11 stunning beautiful deliveries, along with interviews on topics rarely discussed: sexuality of childbirth, side effects of c-sections and circumcision, limbic imprinting, and conscious birth preparation.
tagline: Director Elena Tonetti-Vladimirova shares her experiences as one of the co-creators of the “Conscious Birth” movement in Russia during the early 1980's.
title: Birth As We Know It
